Reviews.Title: “Good.”
Reviews.Author: bagin1981
Reviews.Content: The hotel is good. Convenient location, close to many cafes and shops of different cuisine. Near the station S-ban, from it you can get to almost any station, not far from metro station and right in front of a bus stop. Rooms clean, but the size is not large. At the reception desk is always ready to help. Food delicious, always fresh, big enough choice the only thing that repeats every day. To whom it may eat up to, I'm not bothered. Next to a bar with girls, but does not notice it. The hotel is suitable for young people, tour programs, or those traveling on business. Good 3 *

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is really good for its 3 stars.”
Reviews.Author: andyl2001
Reviews.Content: This hotel is really good for its 3 stars. The rooms, though close, but very clean and the furniture is cheap, but the new thing that has pleased. Staff polite, willing to listen to questions and suggestions have helped, if applied to them, and 24 hours a day. Power, yes, lean, and if to come for breakfast among the latter, you can go without coffee or milk or sosisek)), etc. .. But that's the whole stuff. The hotel is located very close to the subway and the only minus in front of hotel at night, and Turkish settlements nearby prostitutes work, it's nice when you go to a friends and not so great when you go with your family .. But it is in the eye, in any case is not evident and, in principle, does not create a nuisance. By the way, the water is hot, indeed, in the hospitality during peak hours virtually non-existent at night is fine) Total all good).

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Artim Charlottenberg- Richard Nov 2011”
Reviews.Author: Pakses
Reviews.Content: Hotel is very well located only 100yds from S Bahn station. Modern bedroom with ample storage space, good heating, comfortable bed and decent size shower cubicle. Breakfast is buffet style with good choice of cereals, bread, meat, cheese and jams. Cooked selection is scrambled egg, streaky bacon and sausage. Rooms on the front, we stayed in 207, would be noisy in summer if you wanted to sleep with window open- no air conditioning. Staff were helpful if not particularly welcoming- probably the German way. Plenty of restaurants in area, Zico's a Serbian one located 100yds on other side of road very good.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and decent 3 star hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Ikimaki
Reviews.Content: Nice and clean hotel with private parking, rich tasty buffet breakfast, and free wifi. The room 405 was very small, but the bathroom was big , clean and spacious. Heating was also great. Bed was comfortable, but Pilllows were very soft, almost flat. They should considder buying better. Very rich and tasty buffet breakfast should not be missed. Great scrambled eggs with bacon, big variety of cereals, yogurts, salads...etc. Private parking for only 10 euros per day was very good for not worrying about the car. S-bahn is 50 metres away, and brings you in the center in 10 minutes. There is also big grocery store open 24/7 for anything you need. The staff of the hotel was the minus point of the hotel. Cold and unfriendly (except one young boy in night shift who was very pleasant and helpful. I don't know his name, but i think he is the only one there. The rest were women). I did't like they charged my Visa credit card before I even arrived there. I like to have choice of method of payment for the room, as it is usualy practice in many hotels. All in all very good hotel for the 3 star category.

Reviews.Title: “Good for a less-expensive hotel”
Reviews.Author: philliesfan80
Reviews.Content: The Atrium Charlottenburg is a cheaper hotel in the West end of Berlin, the location near the S-Bahn station is perfect and it was very convient for us needing to go to the ICC every day. Breakfast is included and there were many options of food. The rooms are small and the bathrooms are tiny but they were clean, and that's more important. The daytime front desk person was not very friendly, but the night and weekend people were nicer. Free we-fi worked well in our rooms, there is also a computer in the lobby. Overall for the price, this is a nice place to stay/

Reviews.Title: “the actual name of this hotel is ATRIUM”
Reviews.Author: joan-i-carme
Reviews.Content: Don't expect luxuries, but rooms are very clean, relly good breakfast buffet and free wifi. (plus free pc-internet on the groundfloor) Location: interesting, less than 200 m from Banhoff Charlottenburg (trains to/from Schönefeld airport 3€, 45 minuts) Reception/staff: I wasn't impressed very much by the desk staff. They could have been much friendlier, but they became helpful when asked (I think they're Russians). I reccomend the hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good location and excellent value”
Reviews.Author: Lyngpost
Reviews.Content: Small, but very well maintained and clean rooms. A very good breakfast with both hot and cold dishes and several choices in dairy products and cereals. The staff was very kind but also discreet. That has yet to be a crime. Location is perfect with the Berlin-Charlottenburg S-Bahn station just 200 m away. Yes, there is a couple of brothel near the hotel. But you can't really blame the hotel for that - and if you don't bother them, they don't bother you either... We would certainly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great breakfast!!!”
Reviews.Author: scotman11
Reviews.Content: Honestly lovely hotel, very clean, comfort, great location, breakfast was great! Recommendet!!!

Reviews.Title: “good location clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: daveCarlow
Reviews.Content: stayed at the hotel for 2 nights , location was good as it was beside the charlottenburg s-bahn station, hotel itself is very clean cudnt fault that,breakfast was quite good , lots breads,cereal,cheeses, yougurt, english speaking receptionsists we found the ones we spoke with not very friendly or welcoming but they answered any questions we had about berlin, overall i would recommend the hotel, but if we were going berlin we probably would stay closer to city centre for the ease of being central

Reviews.Title: “Good location for ICC, reasonable rooms, Great Breakfast, no Air-Con, noisy road, AWFUL pillows”
Reviews.Author: as530
Reviews.Content: the title says it all. to be fair, it's right next to Charlottenburg S-bahn station, so the location is OK although it's quite close a fairly seedy area (shops with dildos in the windows etc) - and the breakfast, which we weren't expecting to be included, is really good. but the main problem is the noise if your room faces the road in the summer. With no air-con and almost 30 degree heat, we had to sleep with the windows open & consequently were woken early every morning. But if you're on a tight budget and it's not high summer, this place offers great value.

Reviews.Title: “A very good Hotel - extremely well maintained and very clean”
Reviews.Author: Cyneweard
Reviews.Content: I booked this last minute as I wanted to go to IFA, and wanted something within walking distance. 10-15 minute walk As other reviewers have said 2 minutes to Charlotteberg station, bus to airport outside hotel on other side of the road, cab ride is 13 Euro if preferred. I found this hotel to be of a good standard, and extremely well maintained, rooms clean and to an above average standard, staff on desk English speaking and very helpful, good Indian " Chennai " out of hotel right, then right again 5 mins walk " 10 Euro" excluding beer, good Thai also, out left & left 5 mins walk 10-12 Euros great food, the sex clubs, whilst next door you would walk past and not even notice..... finally outside hotel, literally is place that does " Hot Dogs and a big bottle of beer a mere 1.80 Euro. If you looking for a good budget hotel this is one, and I'm sure Berlin has a lot more, I'd certainly stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean Hotel”
Reviews.Author: AthensDim
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very clean and the breakfast more than satisfying. Overall, my stay in the hotel was very pleasant although limited. It is money worthy. Train station (Charlottenburg) is very close and bus station (109 from Tegel Airport) is exaclty outside of the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “good price”
Reviews.Author: Juhani
Reviews.Content: Nice and tidy room near S-train station Charlottenburg. Breakfast is ok. No restaurant or bar in the hotel. The bus nr 109 from Tegel-airport stops right outside the hotel. Costs 2,1 Euro. Taxi about 13 Euro The personel was uninterested but did their job. Interesting neighbourhood with two sexclubs and a sleasy pub in the same block. If you need a "ladyfriend" its nextdoor.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable but Noisy Stay”
Reviews.Author: travelbug512
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel for 6 nights while I attended a conference for work and then enjoyed the sights of Berlin for leisure travel. The hotel is very clean and comfortable. Most of the staff are friendly, speak English, and willing to answer questions. The breakfast which is included in the price is very good with a wide selection including eggs, toast, coffee, cereal, etc. The location is fairly good. It is close to a bus stop or a subway station that will take around the city. My main complaint is that my room was on the street side and quite noisy...I wore earplugs to bed. Be sure to ask for a room away from the street.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: tourist81
Reviews.Content: This hotel is centrally located - less than five minutes walk to the famous Kudamm. From this hotel, it is easy to explore all the main sites of the city. The hotel itself is simple and stylish. The rooms are are well furnished with high standards of cleanliness and comfort. The breakfast was included in our rate and it was excellent. The employees were always prompt and polite. Their recommendations for restaurants, concerts, etc were really good.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Artim Charlottenburg
HotelInfo.Address: Kaiser-Friedrich-Str 53, 10627 Berlin, Germany
